00030 /**
00031  * Color converter class
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Color_Converter
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * Class constructor
00042      * 
00043      * The class constructor is private as all methods from this class are
00044      * static.
00045      * 
00046      * @return  NULL
00047      */
00048     private function __construct()
00049     {}
00050     
00051     /**
00052      * Converts RGB color values into HSL
00053      * 
00054      * This method takes RGB (Red-Green-Blue) color values and converts them
00055      * into HSL (Hue-Saturation-Luminance) color values. RGB values are from 0
00056      * to 255, and HSL values are returned in an array with associative keys.
00057      * Note that the returned hue value is an angle (0-360), and the saturation
00058      * and luminance are percentage (0-100).
00059      * 
00060      * @param   number  The red value (0-255)
00061      * @param   number  The green value (0-255)
00062      * @param   number  The blue value (0-255)
00063      * @param   boolean Round final values
00064      * @return  array   An array with HSL color values
00065      */
00066     public static function rgbToHsl( $R, $G, $B, $round = true )
00067     {
00068         // Check correct values
00069         $R = tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $R, 0, 255 );
00070         $G = tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $G, 0, 255 );
00071         $B = tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $B, 0, 255 );
00072         
00073         // HSL colors storage
00074         $colors = array(
00075             'H' => 0,   // Hue
00076             'S' => 0,   // Saturation
00077             'L' => 0,   // Luminance
00078         );
00079         
00080         // Converts RGB values (0-1)
00081         $R = ( $R / 255 );
00082         $G = ( $G / 255 );
00083         $B = ( $B / 255 );
00084         
00085         // Find the maximum and minimum RGB values
00086         $max = max( $R, $G, $B );
00087         $min = min( $R, $G, $B );
00088         
00089         // RGB delta
00090         $delta = $max - $min;
00091         
00092         // Compute luminance
00093         $colors[ 'L' ] = ( $max + $min ) / 2;
00094         
00095         // Check for chromatic data
00096         if( $delta === 0 ) {
00097             
00098             // No chromatic data
00099             $colors[ 'H' ] = 0;
00100             $colors[ 'S' ] = 0;
00101             
00102         } else {
00103             
00104             // Check luminance
00105             if( $colors[ 'L' ] < 0.5 ) {
00106                 
00107                 // Compute saturation
00108                 $colors[ 'S' ] = $delta / ( $max + $min );
00109                 
00110             } else {
00111                 
00112                 // Compute saturation
00113                 $colors[ 'S' ] = $delta / ( 2 - $max - $min );
00114             }
00115             
00116             // RGB deltas
00117             $R_delta = ( ( ( $max - $R ) / 6 ) + ( $delta / 2 ) ) / $delta;
00118             $G_delta = ( ( ( $max - $G ) / 6 ) + ( $delta / 2 ) ) / $delta;
00119             $B_delta = ( ( ( $max - $B ) / 6 ) + ( $delta / 2 ) ) / $delta;
00120             
00121             // Check RGB max value
00122             if( $R === $max ) {
00123                 
00124                 // Compute hue
00125                 $colors[ 'H' ] = $B_delta - $G_delta;
00126                 
00127             } elseif( $G === $max ) {
00128                 
00129                 // Compute hue
00130                 $colors[ 'H' ] = ( 1 / 3 ) + $R_delta - $B_delta;
00131                 
00132             } elseif( $B === $max ) {
00133                 
00134                 // Compute hue
00135                 $colors[ 'H' ] = ( 2 / 3 ) + $G_delta - $R_delta;
00136             }
00137             
00138             // Check hue
00139             if( $colors[ 'H' ] < 0 ) {
00140                 
00141                 // Increase hue
00142                 $colors[ 'H' ] += 1;
00143                 
00144             } elseif( $colors[ 'H' ] > 1 ) {
00145                 
00146                 // Decrease hue
00147                 $colors[ 'H' ] -= 1;
00148             }
00149         }
00150         
00151         // Convert HSL values
00152         $colors[ 'H' ] = $colors[ 'H' ] * 360;  // Angle
00153         $colors[ 'S' ] = $colors[ 'S' ] * 100;  // Percentage
00154         $colors[ 'L' ] = $colors[ 'L' ] * 100;  // Percentage
00155         
00156         // Round values?
00157         if( $round ) {
00158             
00159             // Process each value
00160             foreach( $colors as $key => $value ) {
00161                 
00162                 // Adds the value
00163                 $colors[ $key ] = round( $value );
00164             }
00165         }
00166         
00167         // Return HSL values
00168         return $colors;
00169     }
00170     
00171     /**
00172      * Converts HSL color values into RGB
00173      * 
00174      * This method takes HSL (Hue-Saturation-Luminance) color values and
00175      * converts them into RGB (Red-Green-Blue) color values. This is the
00176      * reverse method of rgbToHsl().
00177      * 
00178      * @param   number  The hue value (0-360)
00179      * @param   number  The saturation value (0-100)
00180      * @param   number  The luminance value (0-100)
00181      * @param   boolean Round final values
00182      * @return  array   An array with RGB color values
00183      */
00184     public static function hslToRgb( $H, $S, $L, $round = true )
00185     {
00186         // Check correct values
00187         $H = tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $H, 0, 360 );
00188         $S = tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $S, 0, 100 );
00189         $L = tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $L, 0, 100 );
00190         
00191         // RGB colors storage
00192         $colors = array(
00193             'R' => 0,   // Red
00194             'G' => 0,   // Green
00195             'B' => 0,   // Blue
00196         );
00197         
00198         // Converts HSL values (0-1)
00199         $H = ( $H / 360 );
00200         $S = ( $S / 100 );
00201         $L = ( $L / 100 );
00202         
00203         // Check saturation
00204         if( $S === 0 ) {
00205             
00206             // No saturation
00207             $colors[ 'R' ] = $L * 255;
00208             $colors[ 'G' ] = $L * 255;
00209             $colors[ 'B' ] = $L * 255;
00210         
00211         } else {
00212             
00213             // Check luminance
00214             if( $L < 0.5 ) {
00215                 
00216                 // Computing variable #2
00217                 $c2 = $L * ( 1 + $S );
00218                 
00219             } else {
00220                 
00221                 // Computing variable #2
00222                 $c2 = ( $L + $S ) - ( $S * $L );
00223             }
00224             
00225             // Computing variable #1
00226             $c1 = 2 * $L - $c2;
00227             
00228             // Process each RGB color
00229             foreach( $colors as $key => $value ) {
00230                 
00231                 // Create hue variable for specific RGB values
00232                 switch( $key ) {
00233                     
00234                     // Red
00235                     case 'R':
00236                         $vH = $H + ( 1 / 3 );
00237                         break;
00238                     
00239                     // Green
00240                     case 'G':
00241                         $vH = $H;
00242                         break;
00243                     
00244                     // Blue
00245                     case 'B':
00246                         $vH = $H - ( 1 / 3 );
00247                         break;
00248                 }
00249                 
00250                 // Adjust hue variable
00251                 if( $vH < 0 ) {
00252                     
00253                     // Increase hue
00254                     $vH += 1;
00255                     
00256                 } elseif( $vH > 1 ) {
00257                     
00258                     // Decrease hue
00259                     $vH -= 1;
00260                 }
00261                 
00262                 // Check hue
00263                 if( ( 6 * $vH ) < 1 ) {
00264                     
00265                     // Create color value
00266                     $colors[ $key ] = $c1 + ( $c2 - $c1 ) * 6 * $vH;
00267                     
00268                 } elseif( ( 2 * $vH ) < 1 ) {
00269                     
00270                     // Create color value
00271                     $colors[ $key ] = $c2;
00272                     
00273                 } elseif( ( 3 * $vH ) < 2 ) {
00274                     
00275                     // Create color value
00276                     $colors[ $key ] = $c1 + ( $c2 - $c1 ) * ( ( 2 / 3 ) - $vH ) * 6;
00277                     
00278                 } else {
00279                     
00280                     // Create color value
00281                     $colors[ $key ] = $c1;
00282                 }
00283             }
00284             
00285             // Convert RBG colors
00286             $colors[ 'R' ] = $colors[ 'R' ] * 255;
00287             $colors[ 'G' ] = $colors[ 'G' ] * 255;
00288             $colors[ 'B' ] = $colors[ 'B' ] * 255;
00289         }
00290         
00291         // Round values?
00292         if( $round ) {
00293             
00294             // Process each value
00295             foreach( $colors as $key => $value ) {
00296                 
00297                 // Adds the value
00298                 $colors[ $key ] = round( $value );
00299             }
00300         }
00301         
00302         // Return RGB values
00303         return $colors;
00304     }
00305     
00306     /**
00307      * Converts RGB color values into HSV
00308      * 
00309      * This method takes RGB (Red-Green-Blue) color values and converts them
00310      * into HSV (Hue-Saturation-Value) color values. RGB values are from 0 to
00311      * 255, and HSV values are returned in an array with associative keys.
00312      * Note that the returned hue value is an angle (0-360), and the saturation
00313      * and value are percentage (0-100).
00314      * 
00315      * @param   number  The red value (0-255)
00316      * @param   number  The green value (0-255)
00317      * @param   number  The blue value (0-255)
00318      * @param   boolean Round final values
00319      * @return  array   An array with HSV color values
00320      */
00321     public static function rgbToHsv( $R, $G, $B, $round = true )
00322     {
00323         // Check correct values
00324         $R = tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $R, 0, 255 );
00325         $G = tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $G, 0, 255 );
00326         $B = tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $B, 0, 255 );
00327         
00328         // HSV colors storage
00329         $colors = array(
00330             'H' => 0,   // Hue
00331             'S' => 0,   // Saturation
00332             'V' => 0,   // Luminance
00333         );
00334         
00335         // Converts RGB values (0-1)
00336         $R = ( $R / 255 );
00337         $G = ( $G / 255 );
00338         $B = ( $B / 255 );
00339         
00340         // Find the maximum and minimum RGB values
00341         $max = max( $R, $G, $B );
00342         $min = min( $R, $G, $B );
00343         
00344         // RGB delta
00345         $delta = $max - $min;
00346         
00347         // Compute value
00348         $colors[ 'V' ] = $max;
00349         
00350         // Check for chromatic data
00351         if( $delta === 0 ) {
00352             
00353             // No chromatic data
00354             $colors[ 'H' ] = 0;
00355             $colors[ 'S' ] = 0;
00356             
00357         } else {
00358             
00359             // Compute saturation
00360             $colors[ 'S' ] = $delta / $max;
00361             
00362             // RGB deltas
00363             $R_delta = ( ( ( $max - $R ) / 6 ) + ( $delta / 2 ) ) / $delta;
00364             $G_delta = ( ( ( $max - $G ) / 6 ) + ( $delta / 2 ) ) / $delta;
00365             $B_delta = ( ( ( $max - $B ) / 6 ) + ( $delta / 2 ) ) / $delta;
00366             
00367             // Check RGB max value
00368             if( $R === $max ) {
00369                 
00370                 // Compute hue
00371                 $colors[ 'H' ] = $B_delta - $G_delta;
00372                 
00373             } elseif( $G === $max ) {
00374                 
00375                 // Compute hue
00376                 $colors[ 'H' ] = ( 1 / 3 ) + $R_delta - $B_delta;
00377                 
00378             } elseif( $B === $max ) {
00379                 
00380                 // Compute hue
00381                 $colors[ 'H' ] = ( 2 / 3 ) + $G_delta - $R_delta;
00382             }
00383             
00384             // Check hue
00385             if( $colors[ 'H' ] < 0 ) {
00386                 
00387                 // Increase hue
00388                 $colors[ 'H' ] += 1;
00389                 
00390             } elseif( $colors[ 'H' ] > 1 ) {
00391                 
00392                 // Decrease hue
00393                 $colors[ 'H' ] -= 1;
00394             }
00395         }
00396         
00397         // Convert HSL values
00398         $colors[ 'H' ] = $colors[ 'H' ] * 360;  // Angle
00399         $colors[ 'S' ] = $colors[ 'S' ] * 100;  // Percentage
00400         $colors[ 'V' ] = $colors[ 'V' ] * 100;  // Percentage
00401         
00402         // Round values?
00403         if( $round ) {
00404             
00405             // Process each value
00406             foreach( $colors as $key => $value ) {
00407                 
00408                 // Adds the value
00409                 $colors[ $key ] = round( $value );
00410             }
00411         }
00412         
00413         // Return HSV values
00414         return $colors;
00415     }

00417     /**
00418      * Converts HSV color values into RGB
00419      * 
00420      * This method takes HSV (Hue-Saturation-Value) color values and converts
00421      * them into RGB (Red-Green-Blue) color values. This is the reverse
00422      * method of rgb2hsv().
00423      * 
00424      * @param   number  The hue value (0-360)
00425      * @param   number  The saturation value (0-100)
00426      * @param   number  The value value (0-100)
00427      * @param   boolean Round final values
00428      * @return  array   An array with RGB color values
00429      */
00430     public static function hsvToRgb( $H, $S, $V, $round = true )
00431     {
00432         // Check correct values
00433         $H = tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $H, 0, 360 );
00434         $S = tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $S, 0, 100 );
00435         $V = tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $V, 0, 100 );
00436         
00437         // RGB colors storage
00438         $colors = array(
00439             'R' => 0,   // Red
00440             'G' => 0,   // Green
00441             'B' => 0,   // Blue
00442         );
00443         
00444         // Converts HSV values (0-1)
00445         $H = ( $H / 360 );
00446         $S = ( $S / 100 );
00447         $V = ( $V / 100 );
00448         
00449         // Check saturation
00450         if( $S === 0 ) {
00451             
00452             // No saturation
00453             $colors[ 'R' ] = $V * 255;
00454             $colors[ 'G' ] = $V * 255;
00455             $colors[ 'B' ] = $V * 255;
00456         
00457         } else {
00458             
00459             // Hue variables
00460             $vH = $H * 6;
00461             $iH = intval( $vH );
00462             
00463             // Computing variables
00464             $c1 = $V * ( 1 - $S );
00465             $c2 = $V * ( 1 - $S * ( $vH - $iH ) );
00466             $c3 = $V * ( 1 - $S * ( 1 - ( $vH - $iH ) ) );
00467             
00468             // Check hue integer value
00469             if( $iH === 0 ) {
00470                 
00471                 // Create RGB values
00472                 $vR = $V;
00473                 $vG = $c3;
00474                 $vB = $c1;
00475                 
00476             } elseif( $iH === 1 ) {
00477                 
00478                 // Create RGB values
00479                 $vR = $c2;
00480                 $vG = $V;
00481                 $vB = $c1;
00482                 
00483             } elseif( $iH === 2 ) {
00484                 
00485                 // Create RGB values
00486                 $vR = $c1;
00487                 $vG = $V;
00488                 $vB = $c3;
00489                 
00490             } elseif( $iH === 3 ) {
00491                 
00492                 // Create RGB values
00493                 $vR = $c1;
00494                 $vG = $c2;
00495                 $vB = $V;
00496                 
00497             } elseif( $iH === 4 ) {
00498                 
00499                 // Create RGB values
00500                 $vR = $c3;
00501                 $vG = $c1;
00502                 $vB = $V;
00503                 
00504             } else {
00505                 
00506                 // Create RGB values
00507                 $vR = $V;
00508                 $vG = $c1;
00509                 $vB = $c2;
00510             }
00511             
00512             // Create RBG colors
00513             $colors[ 'R' ] = $vR * 255;
00514             $colors[ 'G' ] = $vG * 255;
00515             $colors[ 'B' ] = $vB * 255;
00516         }
00517         
00518         // Round values?
00519         if( $round ) {
00520             
00521             // Process each value
00522             foreach( $colors as $key => $value ) {
00523                 
00524                 // Adds the value
00525                 $colors[ $key ] = round( $value );
00526             }
00527         }
00528         
00529         // Return RGB values
00530         return $colors;
00531     }
00532     
00533     /**
00534      * Converts HSL color values into HSV
00535      * 
00536      * This method takes HSL (Hue-Saturation-Luminance) color values and
00537      * converts them into HSV (Hue-Saturation-Value) color values.
00538      * 
00539      * @param   number  The hue value (0-360)
00540      * @param   number  The saturation value (0-100)
00541      * @param   number  The luminance value (0-100)
00542      * @param   boolean Round final values
00543      * @return  array   An array with HSV color values
00544      */
00545     public static function hslToHsv( $H, $S, $L, $round = true )
00546     {
00547         // Convert HSL to RGB
00548         $rgbColors = self::hslToRgb( $H, $S, $L, $round );
00549         
00550         // Convert RGB to HSV
00551         return self::rgbToHsv(
00552             $rgbColors[ 'R' ],
00553             $rgbColors[ 'G' ],
00554             $rgbColors[ 'B' ],
00555             $round
00556         );
00557     }
00558     
00559     /**
00560      * Converts HSV color values into HSL
00561      * 
00562      * This method takes HSV (Hue-Saturation-Value) color values and converts
00563      * them into HSL (Hue-Saturation-Luminance) color values. This is the
00564      * reverse method of hsl2hsv().
00565      * 
00566      * @param   number  The hue value (0-360)
00567      * @param   number  The saturation value (0-100)
00568      * @param   number  The value value (0-100)
00569      * @param   boolean Round final values
00570      * @return  array   An array with HSL color values
00571      */
00572     public static function hsvToHsl( $H, $S, $V, $round = true )
00573     {
00574         // Convert HSV to RGB
00575         $rgbColors = self::hsvToRgb( $H, $S, $V, $round );
00576         
00577         // Convert RGB to HSL
00578         return self::rgbToHsl(
00579             $rgbColors[ 'R' ],
00580             $rgbColors[ 'G' ],
00581             $rgbColors[ 'B' ],
00582             $round
00583         );
00584     }
